T02D1920:173a-1: krishna ya m'a ri tantra r'a dza par ka na phra d'i pa n'a ma t'i k'a /

T02D1920:176a-41: de'i phyir 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1920:176a-44: rtsod pa yongs su spang bar bya ba bshad zin to //
T02D1920:176a-45: da ni rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid mngon par dgrol bar bya ste /
T02D1920:176a-46: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i chos dang /
T02D1920:176a-48: phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1920:176a-49: khyad par du gyur pa gsum ston pa nyid du byed pa'o //
T02D1920:176a-50: 'di skad ces bya ba ni sdud par byed pa
T02D1920:176b-0: phyag na rdo rjes rgyud thams cad kyi @176b don
T02D1920:176b-1: dang tshig thugs la yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02D1920:176b-2: rang gi shes pa'i rjes su ye shes kyi rgyun
T02D1920:176b-3: gyi ngo bor rgyud ma lus pa'i don bshad pa'i
T02D1920:176b-4: gtso bor phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na
T02D1920:176b-5: nyid gsungs pa'o // de yang 'di skad nyid du
T02D1920:176b-6: thos kyi de la phri ba dang bsnan pa ni
T02D1920:176b-7: cung zad kyang ma byas pa nyid du bstan to
T02D1920:176b-8: nyid gsungs pa'o // // bdag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis ma byas pa dang /
T02D1920:176b-9: gzhan dang gzhan las thos pa dang /
T02D1920:176b-10: brgyud pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1920:176b-11: bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du thos pa'o //
T02D1920:176b-12: thos pa zhes bya ba ni gang du gang las
T02D1920:176b-13: gang gi tshe thos pa zhes bya ba ste rang
T02D1920:176b-14: gi lhag par mos pas so //
T02D1920:176b-15: de yang gzhan thams cad du bkag pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1920:176b-16: ma ti tsi tras smras pa /
T02D1920:176b-17: gsung gcig dag ni gsungs pa ni //
T02D1920:176b-18: grangs med pa yi mtshon pa'o //
T02D1920:176b-19: 'di ltar bdag la gsungs pa zhes //
T02D1920:176b-20: 'gro ba kun gyi rjes su shes //
T02D1920:176b-22: ; de yang thos pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D1920:176b-23: sdud pa'i dus na sangs rgyas so //
T02D1920:176b-25: le'u bco brgyad pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1920:176b-26: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das las ji bzhin du gsungs
T02D1920:176b-27: pa thos te skad cig la bzung zhing don bzung
T02D1920:176b-28: bas bsdus nas legs par rab tu yid la byas
T02D1920:176b-29: so zhes gsungs pa shin tu tshad ma'o //
T02D1920:176b-30: de bas na slob dpon med par rang bzo ni
T02D1920:176b-31: ma byas pa ste yang dag par shes nas byas
T02D1920:176b-32: pa'o // dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni 'dir rnyed par dka' ba dang /
T02D1920:176b-33: bdag nyid thos pa dang ldan pa dang phun sum tshogs pa'i shes rab chen po'o //
T02D1920:176b-34: byin gyi rlabs kyis ldan pa nyid du ston to //
T02D1920:176b-35: gzhan ni phyin ci ma log pa'i zab mo'i chos
T02D1920:176b-36: gzhan du ston par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dis ni
T02D1920:176b-37: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la gus pa dang de
T02D1920:176b-38: brtan po nyid du byed pa'o //
T02D1920:176b-39: dus gcig la bdag gis 'di thos la gzhan du
T02D1920:176b-40: yang gzhan gyi rgyud thos pa'i phyir rab tu thos
T02D1920:176b-42: gal te yi ge tha dad pa dang bshad pa
T02D1920:176b-43: dang tshig dka' ba so so dag ji ltar dus
T02D1920:176b-45: sde tshan gcig ni rgyun ma chad la bar chad med par thos pa'o //
T02D1920:176b-46: rgyud re re zhing de snyed nyid du'o //
T02D1920:176b-47: de dag 'dzin par mi nus so zhe na /
T02D1920:177a-0: sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis @177a * //
T02D1920:177a-1: bsam du med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thob pa'o //
T02D1920:177a-2: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud shin tu gsang ba'i
T02D1920:177a-3: don ni ae bam ma ya ste bshad pa'i rgyud
T02D1920:177a-5: de dag ni re zhig bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1920:177a-6: de yang gang las thos zhe na bcom ldan 'das las te lha'i bu'i bdud dang /
T02D1920:177a-10: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1920:177a-11: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1920:177a-12: byams pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1920:177a-13: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sa
T02D1920:177a-14: bon dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa
T02D1920:177a-15: bla na med pa shes rab kyi cha'i rig pa
T02D1920:177a-17: de bas na shes rab chen pos bcom par gsungs so //
T02D1920:177a-19: ting nge 'dzin gyi bdud bcom pas na shes rab
T02D1920:177a-20: kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs de nyid du byas pa'o
T02D1920:177a-22: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang ;
T02D1920:177a-23: / dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
T02D1920:177a-24: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //
T02D1920:177a-25: drug po de la skal bar brjod //
T02D1920:177a-26: ces 'byung ba ni shugs kyis rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1920:177a-27: de nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T02D1920:177a-28: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gal te de las thos pa'o //
T02D1920:177a-29: yang dag pa nyid du ni phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1920:177a-30: thams cad kyi rtsa ba lhan cig skyes pa ste
T02D1920:177a-31: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1920:177a-33: nga nyid ston pa nga nyid gnas //
T02D1920:177a-34: nga ni 'khor ldan de yi chos //
T02D1920:177a-35: nga ni dus gsum nges 'byung ba //
T02D1920:177a-36: dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu yin //
T02D1920:177a-38: de la gang du gnas nas thos she na /
T02D1920:177a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1920:177a-40: dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo thams cad kyi bha
T02D1920:177a-41: ga rnams la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ston to
T02D1920:177a-42: // de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1920:177a-43: rang gi rang bzhin ni chos kyi sku nyid yin te /
T02D1920:177a-44: kun rdzob tu longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i
T02D1920:177a-45: ngo bos rang rang gi lhag pa'i mos pa'i dbang
T02D1920:177a-46: gis gang dang gang gi rab tu 'byed par gyur
T02D1920:177a-47: pa'i sku 'jig rten pa rab tu dga' ba de
T02D1920:177a-48: dang de'i gzugs su 'gro bar byed pa ni don
T02D1920:177a-49: dam pa'i ye shes blo gros yul du ma byas
T02D1920:177a-50: pa ji bzhin pa de bzhin nyid las gzugs sku
T02D1920:177b-0: @177b sems can gyi don la rab tu gshegs so
T02D1920:177b-2: gal te rang rig dngos 'dzin cing sna tshogs pas 'khrul to zhe na /
T02D1920:177b-3: rang rig dngos 'dod chos sku las //
T02D1920:177b-4: rjes thob sgyu ma'i gzugs su ni //
T02D1920:177b-5: mnyam par bzhag pas 'byung smra ba //
T02D1920:177b-6: skyes bu tha shal brlag par 'gyur //
T02D1920:177b-7: zhes pa nyid kyis rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T02D1920:177b-8: ma yin te chos kyi sku nyid snying rje chen po'i dbang gis longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1920:177b-9: sprul pa'i sku dang sna tshogs par yang snang ste /
T02D1920:177b-10: don dam par ma lus pa'i rtog pa'i dngos po med pas gang du yang ma song ngo //
T02D1920:177b-11: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D1920:177b-12: de yang gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D1920:177b-13: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang mtshan nyid do //
T02D1920:177b-14: spyod lam rnam pa bzhis bzhugs pa'i sku'i phrin las gang ji snyed pa'o //
T02D1920:177b-15: chos bshad pas bzhugs pa ni gsung gi phrin las gang ji snyed pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1920:177b-16: mnyam par bzhag pas bzhugs pa ni thugs kyi phrin las gang ji snyed pa'o //
T02D1920:177b-17: de rnams dbyer med pa'i don ni rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:177b-18: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo bla na med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshim pa'i rgyu nyid do //
T02D1920:177b-19: de nyid mtshon par byed pa ni sku dang gsung
T02D1920:177b-20: dang thugs rdo rje ste bde ba dang stong pa
T02D1920:177b-21: dang gsal ba'o // ro gcig pa nyid kyis rdo
T02D1920:177b-22: rje ste de'i rang bzhin ni bha ga ste gru
T02D1920:177b-23: gsum chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1920:177b-24: de yang brda nyid du shes par bya ste /
T02D1920:177b-27: gzugs med pa'i khams gsum rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1920:177b-28: ye shes skyon med pa nyid mngon sum du byed pas dga' ba'o //
T02D1920:177b-29: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba nas sangs rgyas
T02D1920:177b-30: kyi sa'i bar du rtog pa nges pa 'phel bar
T02D1920:177b-31: byed pas na gyen du 'phags pa'o //
T02D1920:177b-32: gshin rje gshed nag po shin tu gsang ba'i don gyis na khang bu brtsegs pa'o ;
T02D1920:177b-33: / chos thams cad nye bar 'dzin pas na chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
T02D1920:177b-34: chos thams cad la ro gcig pa'i rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
T02D1920:177b-35: khyab cing ma 'dres pa'i don ston pas na bha ga ste /
T02D1920:177b-36: ji srid 'dod chags la sogs pa ma lus pa
T02D1920:177b-37: sel ba'i sems can rjes su 'dzin pa'i don du
T02D1920:178a-0: @178a * // gshin rje gshed nag po'i gzugs dang
T02D1920:178a-1: lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'byung
T02D1920:178a-2: gnas kyi dbus su gzhal yas khang brtsegs par bzhugs
T02D1920:178a-4: de gang la yod ce na /
T02D1920:178a-5: btsun mo zhes bya ba ni shes rab la bya'o //
T02D1920:178a-6: thams cad kyi sgras ni spyan ma dang /
T02D1920:178a-10: rnams zhes bya ba la yang de nyid du bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1920:178a-11: de zhes bya ba ni rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid do //
T02D1920:178a-12: de lta bus ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1920:178a-13: de ltar khyad par can gyi gnas su 'dod chags
T02D1920:178a-14: chen pos 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1920:178a-15: la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems kyis ji ltar yang
T02D1920:178a-16: gyur pa'i rtog pa nub par gyur to //
T02D1920:178a-17: de ni sems can rnams kyi ste 'di ni rjes su gzung ba chen po'o //
T02D1920:178a-18: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i
T02D1920:178a-19: sems bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
T02D1920:178a-20: par zhugs pa'i sems kyis ji ltar gyur pa'i shes
T02D1920:178a-21: pa rgyas pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1920:178a-22: 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa'i rdul phra rab
T02D1920:178a-23: so so'i nang na bzhugs pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas
T02D1920:178a-24: kyi nang na gzhal yas khang brtsegs par dkyil 'khor
T02D1920:178a-25: ma lus pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das
T02D1920:178a-26: rang gi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i bdag
T02D1920:178a-27: nyid rab tu dga' bar bzhugs so //
T02D1920:178a-28: de ni rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi cho gas 'gro
T02D1920:178a-29: ba 'dul ba'i yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1920:178a-30: to // gang dang lhan cig tu thos she na /
T02D1920:178a-31: bcom ldan 'das thabs chen pos dbang po dang bcas
T02D1920:178a-32: par dus shes pa'i don du thun mong ma yin
T02D1920:178a-34: gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-35: phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-36: 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-37: phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-38: zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-40: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-42: ral gri gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D1920:178a-43: rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang /
T02D1920:178a-45: rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang /
T02D1920:178a-46: rdo rje goo r'i ma ste mtshams su'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1920:178b-0: chos thams cad ni gcig dang du ma dang bral ba nyid @178b gyis mi shes pa ste /
T02D1920:178b-1: shes pa med pa nyid ni gti mug chen po'o //
T02D1920:178b-2: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i rang gi
T02D1920:178b-3: ngo bo mi phyed pa de las gzhan 'byed pa
T02D1920:178b-5: dngos su byas pa'i sngags chen po can gyi sngags
T02D1920:178b-6: don dam par smra brgyu 'bras kyi mya ngan las
T02D1920:178b-7: 'das pa ni bdud de gshin rje'o //
T02D1920:178b-8: de'i gshed ni dngos su byas pa'i sngags chen po
T02D1920:178b-9: can gyis bskyed pa ste gti mug rdo rje gshin
T02D1920:178b-10: rje gshed do // des der thos zhes bya'o //
T02D1920:178b-11: gzhan 'byed pa'i tshig ni phra ma ste /
T02D1920:178b-12: gzhan phyi rol gyi rig pa'i grub mtha' ngag can
T02D1920:178b-13: rigs pa dang lung gis bye brag tu sun 'byin
T02D1920:178b-14: bar byed pa rang gi mnyam pa nyid rang rgyud
T02D1920:178b-15: la sbyor zhing de nyid du byed pa ni phra
T02D1920:178b-16: ma chen po'o // mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo
T02D1920:178b-17: dbyer mi phyed pa de dag las gzhan 'byed pa
T02D1920:178b-19: mi mnyam pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni gshin rje'o //
T02D1920:178b-20: de'i gshed ni phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:178b-21: yul yid du 'ong ba la zhen pa ni 'dod
T02D1920:178b-22: chags te sems can gyi don la so sor rtog
T02D1920:178b-23: cing dmigs pa med pa'i snying rjes nye bar khyad
T02D1920:178b-24: par nus pa ni 'dod chags chen po'o //
T02D1920:178b-25: de'i ngo bo mi phyed pa las gzhan 'byed pa ni rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:178b-26: dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo mngon sum du byas
T02D1920:178b-27: te chags pa dang bral ba skyed pa mya ngan
T02D1920:178b-28: las 'das pa ni bdud de gshin rje'o //
T02D1920:178b-29: de'i gshed ni 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:178b-30: pha rol gyi yon tan la yid 'khrugs pa ni phrag dog ste /
T02D1920:178b-31: bdag gis rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa 'grub
T02D1920:178b-32: nas sems can gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par
T02D1920:178b-33: byed pa la bdag bo kho na nyid kyis bya'o
T02D1920:178b-34: // zhes pa gzhan rnam par bcad pa ni phrag dog chen po'o //
T02D1920:178b-35: bya ba nan tan ni mi phyed pa gzhan 'byed pas rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:178b-36: btang snyoms chen po mngon du byed pa dang rang
T02D1920:178b-37: gi don tsam du mya ngan las 'das pa ni
T02D1920:178b-39: de'i gshed ni phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:178b-40: gzhan yang gzhan la brtse ba ma yin pa'i sems
T02D1920:178b-41: dang gnod pa byed pa'i mnar sems pa ni zhe
T02D1920:178b-42: sdang ngo // shes pa dang shes bya la sogs
T02D1920:178b-43: pa'i chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rang rang gi
T02D1920:178b-44: gnas pa la bdag med pa'i ngo bo 'joms par
T02D1920:178b-45: byed pa ni zhe sdang chen po'o //
T02D1920:179a-0: @179a * // chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dbyer mi phyed pa nyid las gzhan 'byed pa ni rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:179a-1: snying rje tsam mngon du byas pa 'am stong par
T02D1920:179a-2: lta ba dag ni snying rje chen po mngon du
T02D1920:179a-3: byas nas ngo bo nyid kyis sems can gyi don
T02D1920:179a-4: byed pa dang bral ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D1920:179a-6: de'i gshed ni zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:179a-7: dad pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa ni tho ba ste 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /
T02D1920:179a-9: phung po'i bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gshin rje ste /
T02D1920:179a-10: de'i gshed ni thob gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:179a-11: brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnam par dag pa ni dbyug pa ste mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D1920:179a-13: nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gshin rje'o //
T02D1920:179a-14: de'i gshed ni dbyug pa gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:179a-15: dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa ni padma ste
T02D1920:179a-16: log par lta ba dang las kyi sgrib pa dang
T02D1920:179a-17: 'chi bdag gi bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i
T02D1920:179a-19: de'i gshed ni padma gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:179a-20: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs rnam par dag pa ni
T02D1920:179a-21: ral gri ste lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang
T02D1920:179a-23: lha'i bu rnam par g-yeng byed kyi bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gshin rje ste /
T02D1920:179a-24: de'i gshed ni ral gri gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:179a-26: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang byams pa
T02D1920:179a-27: chen po nyid kyis gzhan 'dul bas sems ma zhes
T02D1920:179a-28: bya ste / dbyer mi phyed pa'i don gyis rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:179a-29: de'i phyir rdo rje sems ma'o //
T02D1920:179a-30: de'i gshed ni gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed de de mngon du thob pa nyid do //
T02D1920:179a-31: chu'i khams dang stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1920:179a-32: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par
T02D1920:179a-33: rdzogs par byang chub pa yang rang gi dbang po
T02D1920:179a-34: dang gnyis su med par gyur pa ste dbyer mi
T02D1920:179a-36: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes skye zhing rtog pa
T02D1920:179a-37: mtha' dag dang bral bas sems can gyi rgyud de
T02D1920:179a-38: nyid du 'gog pa ni phag mo'o //
T02D1920:179a-39: de nyid zhe sdang spangs nas zhe sdang gshin rje gshed chen po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1920:179a-40: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de mngon du thob pa'o //
T02D1920:179b-0: me'i khams dang smon lam gyi pha rol @179b tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1920:179b-1: dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid ni de yang dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:179b-2: gzhan 'dul ba'i tshogs kyi gnas can ni padma'o //
T02D1920:179b-3: de'i rang bzhin ni dbyings te shes rab kyi pha
T02D1920:179b-4: rol tu phyin pa can ni 'dod chags gshin rje
T02D1920:179b-5: gshed kyi bdag nyid de de dang lhan tsig skyes
T02D1920:179b-6: pa mchog mngon du byed pa ni gnyis su med
T02D1920:179b-7: cing rab tu dga' bar gyur pa ste de nyid
T02D1920:179b-9: rlung gi khams dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu
T02D1920:179b-10: phyin pa dang btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1920:179b-12: goo ni mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga'i gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D1920:179b-13: des sems can gyi don ngo bor 'gro ba 'dzin pa nye bar mtshon pas na r'i'o //
T02D1920:179b-14: de bas na bla na med pa lhan cig skyes
T02D1920:179b-15: pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid goo r'i'o

T02D1920:182b-41: ya sogs yi ge dang po las //
T02D1920:182b-42: gshin rje gshed du gyur pa yin //
T02D1920:183a-2: yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs //
T02D1920:183a-3: yi ge me ni 'dod chags nyid //
T02D1920:183a-4: yi ge me ni phrag dog 'gyur //
T02D1920:183a-5: gshin rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags //
T02D1920:183a-6: yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur //
T02D1920:183a-7: yi ge dza las dbyug pa'i gtso //
T02D1920:183a-8: lag na padma ni yig las //
T02D1920:183a-9: lag na ral gri ra las yin //
T02D1920:183a-10: dza las tsartsi ka zhes brjod //
T02D1920:183a-11: yi ge sa las phag gdong ma'o //
T02D1920:183a-12: yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags //
T02D1920:183a-13: yi ge ru las goo r'i dran //
T02D1920:183a-14: na yo ni r'a mtshams kyi bzhi //
T02D1920:183a-15: thod pa bzhi ru 'dod pa yin //
T02D1920:183a-17: ya sogs yi ge dang po ni ya ste de
T02D1920:183a-18: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D1920:183a-19: aindra n'i la'i kha dog can de las zhe sdang
T02D1920:183a-20: gshin rje gshed du gyur pa yin no //
T02D1920:183a-21: yi ge kshe yongs su gyur pa las chos kyi
T02D1920:183a-22: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa kha dog dung lta bu
T02D1920:183a-23: ste de las gti mug gshin rje gshed du brjod
T02D1920:183a-24: do // yi ge ma yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1920:183a-25: rin po che zur brgyad pa kha dog gser bu
T02D1920:183a-26: tsom ltar rab tu dang ba ste de las phra
T02D1920:183a-27: ma gshin rje gshed du gsungs so //
T02D1920:183a-28: yi ge ma yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab
T02D1920:183a-29: ma bcu drug pa kha dog ni padma r'a ga
T02D1920:183a-30: lta bu ste de las 'dod chags gshin rje gshed
T02D1920:183a-31: nyid do // yi ge da yongs su gyur pa
T02D1920:183a-32: las ral gri rab tu rno zhing 'bar ba kha
T02D1920:183a-33: dog margad lta bu ste phrag dog gshin rje gshed
T02D1920:183a-35: gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs ni lnga ste gong du
T02D1920:183a-36: rdo rje sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis khyad par
T02D1920:183a-37: du byas pa'i phyir grags pa'o //
T02D1920:183a-38: yi ge ya yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje
T02D1920:183a-39: thob rtsibs nyi shus spras pa kha dog bee d'urya
T02D1920:183a-40: sngon po lta bu ste de las tho ba gshin
T02D1920:183a-41: rje gshed du gyur pa yin no //
T02D1920:183a-42: yi ge dza yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje
T02D1920:183a-43: dbyug pa kha dog dkar po ste mtshan pa dang
T02D1920:183a-45: de las dbyug pa gshin rje gshed du gyur pa yin no //
T02D1920:183a-46: yi ge ni yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab
T02D1920:183a-47: ma brgyad pa kha dog dmar po ste de dag
T02D1920:183a-48: las lag na padma 'dzin pa'i padma gshin rje gshed
T02D1920:183a-49: du gyur pa'o // yi ger yongs su gyur pa las ral gri kha dog ljang gu ste /
T02D1920:183a-50: de las lag na ral gri 'dzin pa ral gri gshin rje gshed du gyur pa yin no //
T02D1920:183a-51: yi ge dza las 'khor lo dkar po ste /
T02D1920:183a-52: de las lha mo tsartsi ka zhes brjod do //
T02D1920:183b-0: @183b yi ge sa yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sngon po ste /
T02D1920:183b-1: de las lha mo phag gdong mar gyur to //
T02D1920:183b-2: yi ge do yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po ste /
T02D1920:183b-3: lha mo dbyangs can ma nyid du bsgrags so //
T02D1920:183b-4: yi ge ru yongs su gyur pa las ral gri ljang gu ste /
T02D1920:183b-5: de las lha mo goo r'i ma dran par bya'o //
T02D1920:183b-6: na yo ni r'a gong bzhin du mtshams bzhir byang
T02D1920:183b-7: chub sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa bzhi 'dod pa
T02D1920:183b-8: yin no // de ni gnas gang du bsgom zhe na /
T02D1920:183b-9: sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1920:183b-10: sna tshogs ni pam dkar ser las padma sna tshogs /
T02D1920:183b-11: de'i steng du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs
T02D1920:183b-12: su rung ba de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis g-yogs
T02D1920:183b-13: par byas la de'i steng na gzhal yas khang brtsegs
T02D1920:183b-14: pa'i ngo bo gdan dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o
T02D1920:183b-15: // de'i phyogs dang kha dog gi bye brag dang
T02D1920:183b-16: gzugs sna tshogs pa rnams ni le'u bcu bzhi pa
T02D1920:183b-17: // las gsungs pa'o // dkyil 'khor de dag kyang gang la brten zhe na /
T02D1920:183b-18: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D1920:183b-20: nam mkha' ni bha ga ste chos thams cad kyi
T02D1920:183b-21: rang bzhin yin pas na chos kyi 'byung gnas te
T02D1920:183b-22: phyag rgya'o // de nyid rtog pa ma lus bzad
T02D1920:183b-23: pa'i phyir dbyer mi phyed pa'i don de rdo rje'o
T02D1920:183b-24: phyag rgya'o // // de'i dkyil du gong gi gzhal yas khang bsam mo //
T02D1920:183b-25: de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang der lha rnams kyi phyogs dang go rims ji ltar bzhugs she na /
T02D1920:183b-26: dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed //
T02D1920:183b-27: gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1920:183b-28: shar du gti mug rdo rje ste //
T02D1920:183b-29: lho ru de bzhin phra ma'o //
T02D1920:183b-30: nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste //
T02D1920:183b-31: de bzhin byang du phrag dog go //
T02D1920:183b-32: rdo rje rtsa ba'i mtshams bzhi la //
T02D1920:183b-33: tsartsi ka sogs rnam par bsgom //
T02D1920:183b-34: sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la //
T02D1920:183b-35: tho ba la sogs rnam par bsgom //
T02D1920:183b-36: sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru //
T02D1920:183b-37: mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go //
T02D1920:183b-39: 'di dag gis ni rang gi chu skyes la gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa gsal bar bshad do //
T02D1920:183b-40: de'i dkyil ni gzhal yas khang gi rdo rje lte ba'o //
T02D1920:183b-41: de la bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed ni kha dog
T02D1920:184a-0: gnag cing 'bar ba ste zhe sdang chen po'i @184a
T02D1920:184a-2: chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa'i cha gang gis kyang bsgyur bar mi nus pa'i don dang /
T02D1920:184a-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
T02D1920:184a-4: dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma bsdus pas gshin
T02D1920:184a-5: rje mthar byas pa'i don dang /
T02D1920:184a-6: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byed 'bar ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1920:184a-7: shar du zhes bya ba ni shar gyi phyogs te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1920:184a-8: der rdo rje rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1920:184a-9: ste zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa nye bar bsdu ba'i tshig go //
T02D1920:184a-10: lho ni lho'i phyogs te dbang yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no /
T02D1920:184a-11: der rdo rje rtsibs kyi rtsa ba las gong gi
T02D1920:184a-12: de bzhin du phra ma rdo rje'i yin zhes bya
T02D1920:184a-13: ba ni thams cad nas thams cad du 'khrug pa
T02D1920:184a-15: nub ni nub kyi phyogs te chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rang bzhin no /
T02D1920:184a-16: der rdo rje rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la 'dod chags rdo rje'o //
T02D1920:184a-17: ste zhes bya ba ni byang nye bar bsdu ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1920:184a-18: de bzhin byang du zhes bya ba ni byang gi
T02D1920:184a-19: phyogs te thams cad ma lus par rgyas btab pa'i
T02D1920:184a-20: rang bzhin no // der rdo rje rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la rdo rje phrag dog go //
T02D1920:184a-21: rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste mtshams bzhi ni phyogs gnyis kyi mtshams so //
T02D1920:184a-22: rtsa ba bzhi la zhes bya ba ni shar lho la sogs pa'o //
T02D1920:184a-23: tsartsi ka ni sv'a ra sv'a sti ste la sogs
T02D1920:184a-24: pa ni phag mo dang dbyangs can ma dang goo
T02D1920:184a-25: r'i'o // rnam par bsgom pa ni rang rang gi gtso bo la cung zad phyogs pa'o //
T02D1920:184a-26: sgo ni khyud dang logs dang ngos dang 'gram dang ya phubs dang ldan pa la bya'o //
T02D1920:184a-27: rdo rje'i rtse ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo bzhi ste /
T02D1920:184a-28: phyogs bzhi'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyir sgo bzhi la nye ba dang 'dra ba nyid du gnas pa'o //
T02D1920:184a-29: tho ba ni tho ba gshin rje gshed de /
T02D1920:184a-30: la sogs pa ni dbyug pa dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02D1920:184a-31: rnam par bsgom zhes bya ba ni sgo'i dkyil du'o //
T02D1920:184a-32: sna tshogs rdo rje mtshams bzhir ni phyi mtshams te
T02D1920:184a-33: de la mchod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
T02D1920:184a-34: phyir mi grags par zad do //
T02D1920:184a-35: mgo ni dbang po lnga'i gzhi'o //
T02D1920:184a-36: bzhi ni grangs de dag go //
T02D1920:184a-38: da ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag gzhal yas
T02D1920:184a-39: khang rdzogs par 'byung ba ni sngags dang ldan pa'i
T02D1920:184b-1: de yang ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T02D1920:184b-3: so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni //
T02D1920:184b-4: ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya //
T02D1920:184b-5: zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1920:184b-6: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1920:184b-7: cad kyi bdag pos gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes
T02D1920:184b-8: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D1920:184b-10: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa ste de'i ting nge
T02D1920:184b-11: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gdul bya la sna
T02D1920:184b-12: tshogs par byed pa nyid ston to //
T02D1920:184b-14: sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs par de nyid du gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-15: de yang sngags kyi mthu khyad par can du bya
T02D1920:184b-16: ba ni zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs
T02D1920:184b-17: pa / aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1920:184b-19: rigs gcig pa'i ngo bo gshin rje gshed 'di ltar dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1920:184b-20: de dag gis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par sbyangs
T02D1920:184b-21: nas skal ba dang ldan par byas te bdag nyid
T02D1920:184b-22: la byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1920:184b-23: sngags ni yon tan ma lus pa'i don de bsam par mi nus so //
T02D1920:184b-24: phyogs gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bshad pa ni ye shes lnga dag par 'dzin pa aom ste /
T02D1920:184b-27: de dag gis ni skye ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ;
T02D1920:184b-28: skyes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1920:184b-29: bya ba mi slu ba bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1920:184b-30: thams cad chu'i nang gi zla ba lta bur rtogs pa me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1920:184b-31: thig le dbyer mi phyed pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02D1920:184b-33: hr'i: ni snying po ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs sdud pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-34: shtri: ni stobs ma lus pa mthar byed pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-36: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-37: kri ni byas pa ste thams cad blo nyid snang ba'o //
T02D1920:184b-38: t'a ni de kho na nyid de gang yang ma spangs pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-39: na ni dmyal ba ste 'khor ba nyid bde ba chen po'o ;
T02D1920:184b-40: / na ni spros pa ste gzhan gyi nus pa sel bar byed pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-41: ha au aa ni h'um ste rgyu med pa dang /
T02D1920:184b-43: mthar mi 'dzin pa ste de rtogs pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sdud pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-44: h'um gnyis pas ni ched du nyung ba nyid du sdud pa'o //
T02D1920:184b-45: zhe sdang zad par byed pas na phat do //
T02D1920:185a-1: 'di khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje ste /
T02D1920:185a-2: gal te khyod kyis 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi po 'gems par 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:185a-3: rdo rje sems rang deng khyod kyi //
T02D1920:185a-4: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02D1920:185a-5: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1920:185a-6: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1920:185a-8: tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa bsres pa'i chu la //
T02D1920:185a-9: aom badzra aa mri ta au da ka tha /
T02D1920:185a-10: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te /
T02D1920:185a-11: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1920:185a-12: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02D1920:185a-13: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02D1920:185a-14: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / ces brjod cing blud par bya /
T02D1920:185a-15: de nas 'di dag brjod par bya ste /
T02D1920:185a-16: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis /
T02D1920:185a-17: ngas 'di gyis shig bsgo ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D1920:185a-18: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig ya
T02D1920:185a-19: nga ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas sems
T02D1920:185a-20: can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ta re /
T02D1920:185a-21: de dag ni dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02D1920:185a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la sogs par gsungs pa'i dbab pa'i cho gas dbab par bya'o //
T02D1920:185a-23: de nas bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D1920:185a-24: de ltar bdag gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1920:185a-25: slob ma 'di ni legs bcug nas //
T02D1920:185a-26: bsod nams ji lta de bzhin shog / lha rnams
T02D1920:185a-27: rigs kyi rim pa dag /'di yis dngos grub ji
T02D1920:185a-28: 'drar 'gyur // rigs gang gis ni snod 'gyur dang //
T02D1920:185a-29: bsod nams mthu dag ci 'dra ba //
T02D1920:185a-30: de 'dra dkyil 'khor 'di ru shog / ces de ltar byas nas /
T02D1920:185a-31: khyod kyi mig gis ci 'dra ba dag snang zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D1920:185a-32: de nas de brjod pa'i dkar po dang ser po
T02D1920:185a-33: dang dmar po dang nag por snang ba rnams kyis
T02D1920:185a-34: / zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya
T02D1920:185a-35: ba dang drag shul spyod pa'i dngos grub kyi skal
T02D1920:185a-36: pa can rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1920:185a-38: de nas des bzung ba'i me tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du pra t'itstsha badzra ho //
T02D1920:185a-39: zhes bya ba 'dis dor bar bya'o //
T02D1920:185a-40: de nas me tog dor ba las dman pa dang mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1920:185a-41: de la gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbu'am mdzod
T02D1920:185a-42: spu'am gtsug tor la lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1920:185b-0: @185b gal te spyan nam zhal la lhung na sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:185b-1: yan lag mchog la ni mchog go //
T02D1920:185b-2: yan lag phar pa la ni 'bring ngo //
T02D1920:185b-3: smad kyi cha la ni tha ma'o //
T02D1920:185b-4: gzugs las yun ring bas na shin tu yun ring ba'o //
T02D1920:185b-5: nye ba la ni myur du dngos grub bo //
T02D1920:185b-6: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas kyi le tshe la sogs par bcas par shes par bya'o //
T02D1920:185b-7: lha gnyis kyi bar du gal te lhung na de'i
T02D1920:185b-8: tshe me tog de gang la nye ba de'i rigs
T02D1920:185b-9: yin no // dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na ni dngos grub phran tshegs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:185b-10: gal te ri mo la lhung na de tshe slar yang dor bar bya ste /
T02D1920:185b-11: lan gsum byas kyang de nyid du lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02D1920:185b-12: phyi rol gyi rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02D1920:185b-13: snying po la lhung na ni phran tshegs so //
T02D1920:185b-14: de dag ni me tog dor ba'o //
T02D1920:185b-15: de nas dor ba'i phreng ba de slar yang blangs
T02D1920:185b-16: nas slob ma'i spyi bor bcings nas pra ti grihna
T02D1920:185b-17: tva mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la zhes
T02D1920:185b-18: brjod do // aom badzra sa tva ya tarya tsakshu
T02D1920:185b-19: gha ta dang spha ra na audgha ta aa ti
T02D1920:185b-20: brjod do // sarbba ksho / badzra tsakshur nutta ram /
T02D1920:185b-21: zhes brjod cing gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D1920:185b-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha so so'i ming brjod la /
T02D1920:185b-23: sngon du 'gro bas sgo skyong nas brtsams nas bdag po'i mthar thug par bstan par bya'o //
T02D1920:185b-24: de dag ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1920:185b-26: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1920:185b-27: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02D1920:185b-28: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don slad du //
T02D1920:185b-29: nam mkha' rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1920:185b-30: zhes bya bas gsol ba btab la /
T02D1920:185b-31: bum pa bzung ba'i spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1920:185b-32: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1920:185b-33: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1920:185b-34: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D1920:185b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1920:185b-36: zhes brjod nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i bum
T02D1920:185b-37: pa nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la
T02D1920:185b-38: / aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D1920:185b-40: slob ma 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1920:185b-41: de dag ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1920:185b-42: de nas rang gi lha dang lhan cig pa'i gser
T02D1920:185b-43: dang ras la sogs pa las byas pa'i cod pan
T02D1920:185b-44: slob ma'i mgo bor sngar smras pa'i rim pas legs
T02D1920:186a-2: mkhas pa rnams kyis phyogs tsam brjod //
T02D1920:186a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1920:186a-5: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni lus ngag
T02D1920:186a-6: yid gsum 'bar bar bya ba'i don to //
T02D1920:186a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa /
T02D1920:186a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1920:186a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1920:186a-11: aom sarba th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1920:186a-13: / gsung gi gnas ni lkog ma'o //
T02D1920:186a-14: thugs kyi gnas ni snying ga'o //
T02D1920:186a-15: yig 'bru ni aom a'a: h'um ngo //
T02D1920:186a-16: de nas skyes pa'i mtshan ma ni 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje'o //
T02D1920:186a-17: de las skyes pa'i sku rdo rje dang gsung rdo rje dang thugs rdo rje'o //

T02D1920:192b-3: dur khrod dag tu du ba bsgrub //

T02D1920:192b-5: mig sman las kyis bsgoms pa la //

T02D1920:192b-9: rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni

T02D1920:192b-11: lo dang ldan pa'i nang du ram las bskyed pa'i
T02D1920:192b-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge dha
T02D1920:192b-13: sa rab tu brgyan par bya'o //
T02D1920:192b-14: de la ral gri 'bar bas rab tu brgyan pas
T02D1920:192b-15: rdo rje las rig pa dang bcas pa bskyed par

T02D1920:192b-18: mi'i tshil bu ni lcags kyi snod du legs par bzhu ba dag go //

T02D1920:192b-23: bal dang lhan cig tu gzhag ste me sbar ba'i
T02D1920:192b-24: sdong bu bya'o // dur khrod kyi gnas dag tu

T02D1920:192b-36: khrag dang gur gum gzung byas nas //
T02D1920:192b-37: rkang pa byug pa bsgrub par bya //
T02D1920:192b-38: rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1920:192b-41: khrag ni rang gi ste srin lag go //

T02D1920:193a-1: gcig la dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su phyin par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:193a-2: da ni ri lu bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1920:193a-3: bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la //

T02D1920:193a-5: lcags gsum du ni bcug byas nas //
T02D1920:193a-8: bdud rtsi lnga ni bee ro tsa na dang /

T02D1920:193a-13: sha lnga ni mi sha dang /
T02D1920:193a-18: de dag gi tshad mnyam pa na tsa na ka'i rus pa'i tshad tsam mo //
T02D1920:193a-22: de gsum yang cha mnyam pa ste srang bzhi'o //
T02D1920:193a-23: de yang man cha'i ri lu bcings pas thub par

T02D1920:193a-33: las kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1920:193a-34: las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis //

T02D1920:193a-43: las byas pa'i mda' gzhur gyur nas de las skyes
T02D1920:193a-44: pa'i gzhon nu gdong drug sku mdog gser btso ma'i

T02D1920:193a-50: ldan pa bsgoms la las kyi ral gri sor brgyad

T02D1920:193b-8: // bsgrub pa'o // pa bsgrub pa'o // phra ma

T02D1920:193b-11: // bsgrub pa'o // pa bsgrub pa'o // pa'o //

T02D1920:193b-14: ral gri'i rdo rje sbyor bas rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyang bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1920:193b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
T02D1920:193b-16: gshin rje gshed nag po las zhes bya ba ni
T02D1920:193b-17: bshad zin to // thabs sna tshogs pa ni las
T02D1920:193b-18: te bya ba ni lha'i ngo bo nyid kyi sbyor
T02D1920:193b-19: bshad zin to // ba mchog go // bsgrub bya tha dad pas ni rim pas phyed pa'o //
T02D1920:193b-20: gnyis las ltos nas gsum pa ste le'u gsum pa'i
T02D1920:193b-21: bshad pa nag po zhabs kyis rgya cher gsal bar
T02D1920:193b-23: / de ltar dngos grub kyi las kyi sbyor ba bshad nas /
T02D1920:193b-24: da ni gzhan thams cad drag po la gzhug pa'i
T02D1920:193b-25: sbyor bas bdag nyid la gzhug par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1920:193b-26: 'khor lo'i le'u bshad par bya ste /
T02D1920:193b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1920:193b-28: cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
T02D1920:193b-29: po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol
T02D1920:193b-30: ba btab pa / las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye la //
T02D1920:193b-32: rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol //
T02D1920:193b-33: nyon cig ye shes chen po rnams //
T02D1920:193b-35: bstod pa'i rgyal po ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D1920:193b-36: de dang 'brel pa'i tshig ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig gis gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D1920:193b-37: las kyi dbye ba ni dam tshig ste zhi ba
T02D1920:193b-38: dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag po dang dgug
T02D1920:193b-39: pa dang bcing ba dang bsad pa'o //

T02D1920:193b-41: sems can ni ma rungs pa dang /
T02D1920:193b-42: btang snyoms dang mnyam pa la 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D1920:194a-0: dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje chen po thugs su chud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa @194a * //
T02D1920:194a-1: khyed kyis ji ltar nus pa dang ldan pa bshad du gsol /

T02D1920:194a-4: ldan pa rnams yid la byos shig ces bya ba'i
T02D1920:194a-5: don to // de nas rdo rje 'dzin dkyil 'khor

T02D1920:194a-9: pa kun gso ba'i bdag nyid kyis 'og nas 'byung

T02D1920:194a-15: yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das

T02D1920:194a-23: bzlas pa'i nus pa ni 'khor bar 'byung bas mthu thun mong ma yin par bstan to //

T02D1920:194a-27: ma byung ba ni sangs rgyas rab bdun te gzhan la'o //
T02D1920:194a-28: zhing dag pa'i bstan pa la sangs rgyas par 'dod
T02D1920:194a-29: pa dag gis byams pa'i bstan pa la yang 'byung

T02D1920:194a-33: bud med dbang du bya ba dang //
T02D1920:194a-34: bsrung ba'i don du de bzhin du //
T02D1920:194a-35: zhi ba'i ro tsa nas bzung ste ;
T02D1920:194a-36: / grog de bzhin shing shun la //
T02D1920:194a-37: 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la //

T02D1920:194a-39: gnag dang spu can ma yin pa'i //
T02D1920:194a-40: kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te //
T02D1920:194a-41: mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba gzhug / skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing //
T02D1920:194b-0: shar du mngon par @194b phyogs pa yis //
T02D1920:194b-1: me tog dkar pos dus gsum gtor //
T02D1920:194b-2: gshin rje mthar byed chu shel 'dra //
T02D1920:194b-3: bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun du dgod //
T02D1920:194b-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //

T02D1920:194b-6: bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi //
T02D1920:194b-7: bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dra //
T02D1920:194b-8: sangs rgyas du mas dbang bskur ba //
T02D1920:194b-9: bltas dang sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam //

T02D1920:194b-19: pas ni bsrung ba'i don du yang 'gyur ro //

T02D1920:195a-33: aom hr'i:shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat
T02D1920:195a-34: phat boo sha ta na ma:de ba datta sya ba
T02D1920:195a-35: sham ku ru boo sha ta na ma: 'di ni

T02D1920:198b-31: ma gcig gis gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1920:198b-33: sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la //
T02D1920:198b-34: brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bri //
T02D1920:198b-35: zhes pa ste dur khrod kyi ras ni ro'i ras so//
T02D1920:198b-36: de khyad par du mtshon gyis bsnun pa'o //
T02D1920:198b-37: gdug pa'i rdzas kyis btul la lus ngag yid gsum
T02D1920:198b-38: gyi brtul zhugs can gyis tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor
T02D1920:198b-42: ske tshe dang ni tsha dar ni //
T02D1920:198b-43: dug dang gzhan yang nim ba dang //
T02D1920:198b-44: tsha ba gsum dang tsha ba'i mar //
T02D1920:198b-45: da du lo ma'i khu ba dang //
T02D1920:198b-46: tsandan 'bras bu mdzub mo'i khrag / tsi tra ka yi khu ba dang //
T02D1920:198b-47: tsha sgo can gyi sa blangs te //
T02D1920:198b-48: gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang //
T02D1920:198b-50: ske tshe ni rigs ngan gyi ldum ra nas skyes pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1920:199a-0: tsha ni bod bus gcin btang ba'i @199a * //
T02D1920:199a-2: / dug ni mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-3: nim pa ni ni ma pa'i lo ma skyur du sbangs pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-4: tsha ba gsum ni pi pi ling dang na le sham dang rdzar rdza'o //
T02D1920:199a-5: tsha ba'i mar ni yungs kar nag po'i mar khu'o //
T02D1920:199a-6: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba ni til mkhan gyi til rdo las byung ba'o //
T02D1920:199a-7: tsandan gyi 'bras bu ni gtum po'i sa bon no //
T02D1920:199a-8: mdzub mo ni g-yung mo'i mdzub mo ste de'i khrag go //
T02D1920:199a-9: tsi tra ka'i khu ba ni bya rog gi sgo nga dang bsres te /
T02D1920:199a-10: tsha sgo can gyis ni chu zad par byas pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-11: gdol pa ni ro'i mkhar len pa ste rdza ma ni 'bras chan 'tshed pa'i snod do //
T02D1920:199a-12: drag pa ni du ba chags pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-13: de dag gis ni bri ba yang bya'o //
T02D1920:199a-14: de'i sbyor ba gsungs pa ni /
T02D1920:199a-15: rab tu ltogs pa'i myu gu yis //
T02D1920:199a-16: bcu bzhi la ni brtul zhugs can //
T02D1920:199a-17: khros pa'i sems kyis nyi phyed na //
T02D1920:199a-18: gdug ba can rnams gsad pa'i phyir //
T02D1920:199a-19: sems can gnon par byed pa'i mi //
T02D1920:199a-20: yi ge h'um gis brten byas la //
T02D1920:199a-22: rab tu ltogs pa ni rgyun du ltogs pa ste bya rog go //
T02D1920:199a-23: de'i gshog pa g-yas kyi sgro'i myu gus tshes bcu
T02D1920:199a-24: bzhi'i nam phyed kyi dus su man ngag gi lugs
T02D1920:199a-26: de yang brtul zhugs can shin tu khros pa'i sems
T02D1920:199a-27: kyis gdug pa can rnams gsang par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1920:199a-28: the tshom med pa la lta ba'i nga rgyal dang
T02D1920:199a-29: mi 'bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can gang
T02D1920:199a-30: gnod par byed pa'i ming dang h'um spel pa nyid
T02D1920:199a-31: kyis brten byas la zhes bya'o //
T02D1920:199a-32: bsgom par bya ba gsungs pa ni /
T02D1920:199a-33: bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i //
T02D1920:199a-34: sbyor bas lho phyogs kha bltas te //
T02D1920:199a-35: khro chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs //
T02D1920:199a-36: rus pas mgo bo bsam brgyan pa //
T02D1920:199a-38: bdag nyid ni rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid do //
T02D1920:199a-39: gshin rje mthar byed pa'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1920:199a-40: lho phyogs su kha bltas pa ni rab tu bsad ba la shis pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1920:199a-41: khro bo chen po ni thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-42: rab tu drag po'i gzugs ni rno zhing 'bar ba'i cha byad thun mong ma yin pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-43: rus pa ni rang bzhin gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1920:199a-44: mgo bo ni byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas so //
T02D1920:199a-45: bsam pa ni med na bsgom par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1920:199a-46: brgyan pa ni dngos su bgo bar bya'o //
T02D1920:199b-0: de yang 'di ltar gsal @199b bar bya ba ste /
T02D1920:199b-1: ma he la bzhugs lce phyung 'dril //
T02D1920:199b-2: gsus pa che la rab 'jigs pa //
T02D1920:199b-4: smar smin ma de bzhin ser //
T02D1920:199b-5: g-yas na rdo rje chen po dang //
T02D1920:199b-6: gnyis pa na ni ral gri dang //
T02D1920:199b-7: gsum pa'i phyag na gri gug go //
T02D1920:199b-8: da ni g-yon pa'i bri bar bya //
T02D1920:199b-10: thod pa nyid ni g-yon na'o //
T02D1920:199b-11: rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag / g-yas pa zla 'od bzang po 'dra //
T02D1920:199b-12: g-yon ba dmar po yin par brtan //
T02D1920:199b-14: rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan //
T02D1920:199b-15: ba spu'i khung nas 'jigs chen po //
T02D1920:199b-16: rang rig bdag po rab 'phro ba //
T02D1920:199b-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na ni //
T02D1920:199b-18: zhabs ni g-yon pa brkyang bas gnas //
T02D1920:199b-19: mche ba gtsigs shing 'gying ba yi //
T02D1920:199b-20: bskal pa 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs //
T02D1920:199b-22: ma he ni de'i 'khor ba'i sems can te de
T02D1920:199b-23: la bzhugs pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dri
T02D1920:199b-25: lce phyung zhing 'dril ba ni gdug pa can myur ba nyid du gsod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-26: gsus pa che ba ni srid pa gsum lto ba na gnas pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-27: rab tu 'jigs pa ni zhe sdang gi bdag nyid gtsor gyur ba'o //
T02D1920:199b-28: ba spu'i bu ga'i 'od zer gyis 'byung po sreg par byed do //
T02D1920:199b-29: skra 'bar ba ni me lta bu ste srid pa
T02D1920:199b-30: gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i brdar dbu skra gyen du
T02D1920:199b-31: 'greng ba'o // sma ra smin ma ser po ni
T02D1920:199b-32: srin po'i rtags nye bar 'dzin pa ste gsod pa
T02D1920:199b-34: rdo rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ste ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-35: ral gri ni zhe sdang chen po nyid kyis khams gsum gcod pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-36: gri gug ni bla na med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-37: 'khor lo ni chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i 'khor lor mkhyen pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-38: padma ni 'khor ba'i skyon gang gis kyang ma gos pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-39: che ba ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gi 'dab ma dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-40: thod pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyis thugs rgyud rab tu tshim pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-41: g-yas g-yon ni zung du 'jug pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-42: gzhan du phyag drug pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T02D1920:199b-43: la phyag mtshan drug ni ser sna la sogs pa'i
T02D1920:199b-44: skyon drug sel ba'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1920:199b-45: rtsa ba'i zhal gnag pa ni mi 'gyur ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'o //
T02D1920:199b-46: g-yas pa zla ba'i 'od ni dngos po'i dri ma med pa'i phyir stong pa'o //
T02D1920:200a-0: g-yon dmar pa ni snying rjes @200a * //
T02D1920:200a-1: zhen pa'i mtshan ma med pa'o //
T02D1920:200a-2: rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa ste gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:200a-3: rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni sbrul brgyad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1920:200a-4: rab tu brgyan pa ni mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1920:200a-5: ba spu'i khung ni bu ga chen po'o //
T02D1920:200a-6: 'jigs pa chen po ni khro ba'o //
T02D1920:200a-7: rang rig bdag po ni gti mug la sogs pa'o //
T02D1920:200a-8: rab tu 'phro ba ni spros nas bsgrub bya'i lus
T02D1920:200a-9: la bcug ste byin gyis brlab pa'i lha yang dag
T02D1920:200a-10: par mchod la des ji ltar bya ba mchod de
T02D1920:200a-11: / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nges pa'i ngo bo byed pas 'dir dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:200a-12: de bas na 'di yongs su thong shig ces brjod
T02D1920:200a-13: la ye shes kyi 'khor lo rang gi sa bon
T02D1920:200a-14: la bsdu'o // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni byang chub
T02D1920:200a-15: kyi sems nye bar 'phel bar byed pa nyid do
T02D1920:200a-16: la bsdu'o // // zhabs g-yon brkyang ba ni sangs rgyas kyis sa la gnas pa'o //
T02D1920:200a-17: mche ba bcu gnyis gtsigs pa ni rten 'brel zad par bya ba'i don ston to //
T02D1920:200a-18: bsgyings pa ni tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pas rang dang 'dra pa'i yum dang gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1920:200a-19: bskal ba 'bar ba'i me ni dus mtha'i me'o //
T02D1920:200a-20: de dang mtshungs pa ni mthu thogs ba mi mnga' ba'i don to //
T02D1920:200a-21: 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi sgrub pa brtsams par
T02D1920:200a-22: bya ste bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod do
T02D1920:200a-23: // gdug pa'i mtshon gyis brgyab pa yis //
T02D1920:200a-24: dri ma can la nad kyis gzir //
T02D1920:200a-25: gos med 'dar zhing nyam chung ba //
T02D1920:200a-26: don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing //
T02D1920:200a-27: mtshon gyis gzir bar byas pa yi //
T02D1920:200a-28: rnag gi thum pos lus gang ba //
T02D1920:200a-29: grang ba'i rlung gis gcos gyur cing //
T02D1920:200a-30: me yi nang du zhugs pa la //
T02D1920:200a-31: ma he dang ni stag dag dang //
T02D1920:200a-32: khyi dang mchu rings can dag dang //
T02D1920:200a-33: sangs rgyas des ni mngon 'jigs pa'i //
T02D1920:200a-34: sdig po che dag zad par byed //
T02D1920:200a-36: bsgrub bya ni dmigs par bya ba'i yul lo //
T02D1920:200a-37: mdun du dgod ces ba ni lho phyogs su'o //
T02D1920:200a-38: de nyid la sgrub pa pos mthun par brtags pa'i
T02D1920:200a-39: sngags kyi bzlas pa byas pas rigs kyi rgyal po
T02D1920:200a-40: spros te / sngar gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang
T02D1920:200a-41: bral bar byas pa de dag la lcags kyu dang
T02D1920:200a-42: zhags pa'i sbyor bas bkug ste rab tu thim par
T02D1920:200a-43: spros te / bya'o // de nas 'khor lo dang /
T02D1920:200b-0: mdung @200b rings la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i mtshon gyis
T02D1920:200b-1: rab tu brgyan pa'i byang chub sems kyi mda' ji
T02D1920:200b-2: snyed pa bsdus shing gdug pa'i du ba sngo ljang
T02D1920:200b-3: du 'jug pas lus khyab pa'i dri ma can byas
T02D1920:200b-4: pa la nad sna tshogs kyis mi bzod par gzir
T02D1920:200b-5: cing gos med la rab tu 'dar zhing nyam chung
T02D1920:200b-6: ba de dag ae ma'o bdag kho na shi bar
T02D1920:200b-7: gyur na ci ma rung zhes don 'dod pa'i tshig
T02D1920:200b-9: mtshon cha gdug pa can gyis gzir bar byas pa'i
T02D1920:200b-10: rang gi thum pos lus gang bar gyur pa la
T02D1920:200b-11: / nub byang gi mtshams nas grangs ba'i rlung mdog
T02D1920:200b-12: dud kar gnas pa la 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byin pa
T02D1920:200b-13: dag gis gces par gyur cing bskyod par gyur pas
T02D1920:200b-14: me rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs pa la
T02D1920:200b-15: dur khrod kyi gnas nas ma he dang /
T02D1920:200b-16: stag dang khyi rgod dang sbrang bu mchu rings can
T02D1920:200b-17: la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
T02D1920:200b-18: dang / gsang sngags kyi sde mngon par 'jigs pa'i
T02D1920:200b-19: sdig pa stobs che ba dang ldan pa de dag
T02D1920:200b-20: rngam par zad par byed par bsam mo //
T02D1920:200b-21: gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba chen po ni /
T02D1920:200b-22: mthar byed pa yi ltor gnas pa //
T02D1920:200b-23: tsher mas lus ni gang ba dang //
T02D1920:200b-24: rkang pa shing lcags sgrog gis bsdams //
T02D1920:200b-25: de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas //
T02D1920:200b-26: pags pa dag ni bshus byas nas //
T02D1920:200b-27: de la tsha dang ske tshes bsku //
T02D1920:200b-28: hu zhes zer ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1920:200b-30: mthar byed ma ni gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1920:200b-31: lto ba ni 'khor lo ste de la gnas pa ni bsgrub bya'o //
T02D1920:200b-32: gdug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sprul pa'i khro bo'i
T02D1920:200b-33: tshogs rnams kyis gdug pa can gyi tsher ma phur
T02D1920:200b-34: bu'i dbyibs su 'dug pa lag pa g-yon du thogs
T02D1920:200b-35: nas g-yas kha'i tho bas brdung zhing /
T02D1920:200b-36: aom gha gha zhes lus bkas pa dang rkang pa
T02D1920:200b-37: shing gi gdos dang lcags sgrog gis bsdams nas sngar
T02D1920:200b-38: bzhin du spros pas gdug pa'i mtshon cha dag gis
T02D1920:200b-39: lus dum bu dum bur byas pa dang /
T02D1920:200b-40: la la ni pags pa dag bshus par byas nas
T02D1920:200b-41: gdug pa'i rdzas tsha dang ske tshe la sogs pas
T02D1920:200b-42: bsku bar byed cing hu zhes zer ba mdangs rab
T02D1920:200b-44: shin tu drag po'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D1920:200b-45: de yi lus bsrung la sogs pa //
T02D1920:200b-46: bcad pa dag pa ni mdun du dgod //
T02D1920:200b-47: de'i go cha yang med byas nas //
T02D1920:200b-48: stong pa'i lus ni mdun du bsam //
T02D1920:201a-0: @201a * // rang gi lus byung khro bo ni //
T02D1920:201a-1: gshin rje gshed tshogs bdag nyid 'dras //
T02D1920:201a-2: de yis lus la brgyab nas ni //
T02D1920:201a-3: tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed //
T02D1920:201a-4: de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgom //
T02D1920:201a-5: lag na dbyug pa stobs po che //
T02D1920:201a-6: gdug pa can de rdeg par byed //
T02D1920:201a-7: de yi rgyu ma'i phreng ba sogs //
T02D1920:201a-8: bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro //
T02D1920:201a-9: sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni //
T02D1920:201a-10: lha ma yin la sogs pas rdeg /'di ltar bsgrub bya nyams bya ba //
T02D1920:201a-11: snying rje la gnas sems kyis ni //
T02D1920:201a-12: byed pa 'khor ba'i gnas bton nas //
T02D1920:201a-13: sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed //
T02D1920:201a-15: de'i lus bsrung zhes bya ba ni bla ma 'am
T02D1920:201a-16: rig sngags pa gzhan dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1920:201a-17: 'khor lo sogs pa ni phur bu dang mdud pa
T02D1920:201a-18: yang yungs dkar dang rdzas gzhan dag la sogs pa
T02D1920:201a-19: bcad pa dag gis bral bar bya ba'o //
T02D1920:201a-20: mdun du dgod ba ni nam mkha' la'o //
T02D1920:201a-21: de'i go cha ni rdo rje go cha ste med par byas nas bya ba ni bshus pa'o //
T02D1920:201a-22: stong pa ni rang rgyud pa ste lus ni gcer bu ba'o //
T02D1920:201a-23: de lta bu'i bsgrub bya mdun du bsam mo //
T02D1920:201a-24: rang gi lus kyi snying ga nas byung ba'i gshin
T02D1920:201a-25: rje gshed kyi tshogs bdag nyid kho na 'dra bas
T02D1920:201a-26: 'jig rten pa'i bsrung ba la sogs pa bzung nas
T02D1920:201a-27: rang gi 'og gi chu skyes la bcug ste /
T02D1920:201a-28: phur bu gshin rje gshed yang dag par btab nas rdo rjes mnan no //
T02D1920:201a-29: de'i lus la gdug pa'i mtshon chas brgyab nas tshil
T02D1920:201a-30: gyi khu ba dang rkang mar dag 'thung bar byed
T02D1920:201a-31: do // de'i mdun du stobs can gyi gshin rje bsgom ste /
T02D1920:201a-32: lag na dbyug pa stobs rab tu che ba rdo
T02D1920:201a-33: rjes brgyan pas gdug pa can de nan tan gyis
T02D1920:201a-34: brdeg par bya'o // de'i rgyu ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1920:201a-35: nang grol dag kyang bya rgod kyis nam mkha' la
T02D1920:201a-36: khyer nas dum bur za zhing 'gro ba dang sa'i
T02D1920:201a-37: 'og nas klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pas
T02D1920:201a-38: dum bur brdeg cing lhag ma ma lus par byed
T02D1920:201a-40: gal te theg pa chen po ni sems can thams
T02D1920:201a-41: cad la brtse ba chen po dang ldan pa nyid
T02D1920:201a-42: do // 'di dag gis 'bras bu 'jig par byed do zhe na /
T02D1920:201a-44: 'di ltar bsgrub bya nyams bya ba //
T02D1920:201a-45: snying rje la gnas so zhes bya ba gsang ba
T02D1920:201a-46: bla na med pa nyams par byas nas rdo rje
T02D1920:201b-0: dmyal ba las mi thar ba'i phyir @201b gdug pa
T02D1920:201b-1: de dag bde ba thob par bya pa'i sems kyis
T02D1920:201b-3: dbang gis yongs su smin par byas nas ye shes
T02D1920:201b-4: kyi 'khor lo dang tha mi dad pas gshegs su
T02D1920:201b-5: gsol bas sdug bsngal byed pa'i rgyu 'khor ba'i gnas
T02D1920:201b-6: nas bton nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar
T02D1920:201b-7: byed do // da ni gsang ba bsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D1920:201b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams
T02D1920:201b-9: cad khyad par can gyi thugs kyis 'di lta bu'i
T02D1920:201b-11: ae ma'o bsad pa yang dag bsad //
T02D1920:201b-12: bsang pa ma yin sdig las grol //
T02D1920:201b-13: ji srid bsad kyang ma bsad de //
T02D1920:201b-14: sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis //
T02D1920:201b-15: mnar med la sogs mi skye bar //
T02D1920:201b-16: ae ma sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i bdag / ae ma'o
T02D1920:201b-17: sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag / bsad pas byang chub
T02D1920:201b-18: thob par byed // ces bya ba smos te /
T02D1920:201b-19: ae ma zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba 'dus pa ngo mtshar ba'i don to //
T02D1920:201b-20: bsad pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rtsa ba bcad pas yang dag par bsad pa'o //
T02D1920:201b-21: 'dus byas pa zhig pa ni bsad pa ma yin te /
T02D1920:201b-23: sdig pa las grol ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1920:201b-24: de bas na 'khor ba pa ji srid pa bsad
T02D1920:201b-25: kyang rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ma
T02D1920:201b-26: bsad pa ste / de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi stobs che ba'i ngo mtshar ro //
T02D1920:201b-28: sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis //
T02D1920:201b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te don lhag par brjod pa ni med do //
T02D1920:201b-30: da ni thun mong ma yin pas bsad pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D1920:201b-31: sems can gsod pa bsad pa nyid //
T02D1920:201b-32: snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas //
T02D1920:201b-33: ae ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog / snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur //
T02D1920:201b-35: gshin rje mthar byed pa'i stobs kyis sems can gsod
T02D1920:201b-36: pa ni yang dag par gsod pa nyid du byed
T02D1920:201b-37: pa ni rgyu snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas
T02D1920:201b-38: pa'o // ae ma'o dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje
T02D1920:201b-39: dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje'i stobs kyis
T02D1920:201b-41: sems can la dmigs pa dang chos tsam la dmigs pa'i snying rje ni dman pa ste /
T02D1920:201b-42: bsad pa dang bsad pa chen po'i sbyor ba yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:201b-43: de dag gi sngags gsungs pa ni /
T02D1920:202a-1: t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat de ba datta m'a ra ya h'um /

T02D1920:202a-4: phat phat de ba datta m'a ra ya h'um phat
T02D1920:202a-6: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rtog pa

T02D1920:202a-21: nag po zhabs kyis bshad pa'i le'u bzhi pa rgya cher gsal bar byas pa'o /
T02D1920:202a-23: // / de ltar las kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyang
T02D1920:202a-24: 'khor lo la rag las pa'i phyir 'khor lo'i sngon

T02D1920:202a-26: cha gcig pa'i dbye ba dang bskrad pa'i las gnyis
T02D1920:202a-27: shes nas 'khor lo bri bar gsungs pa /

T02D1920:202a-30: bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris byas la //
T02D1920:202a-31: thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug / ces bya

T02D1920:202a-36: bsgrub bya'i ming ni bla dags dang bcas pa bri bar byas la /
T02D1920:202a-37: thod pa ni pho mo gnyis ka'i byi tang ka

T02D1920:202a-40: du bris pa'i 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o //

T02D1920:202a-42: skud pa sngon pos bcing byas te //
T02D1920:202a-43: nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni //

T02D1920:202a-46: skud pa sngon po ni da du ra'i lo ma dang /
T02D1920:202a-47: ra mi ta nag po'i lo ma bsres te de gnyis sbyar bas bcos pa'o //
T02D1920:202b-0: de yang thod ba'i mthil gnyis su kha phye @202b ba lta bur bcings te /
T02D1920:202b-1: tshes drug gi nyi ma phyed kyi dus su dur
T02D1920:202b-2: khrod kyi sa'i gting gru gsum du brus te dur
T02D1920:202b-3: khrod kyi g-yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram bris

T02D1920:202b-8: lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis //
T02D1920:202b-9: mdun du bsgom bya dgod par bya //
T02D1920:202b-10: zhes bya ba smos te gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba ni /
T02D1920:202b-11: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal lo //
T02D1920:202b-12: rta dang ma he zhon pa ni bsgrub bya ste gho dang dha las bskyed pa'o //
T02D1920:202b-13: bsgrub bya gnyis ni lag na mtshon thogs shing bral ba'i bsam pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1920:202b-14: mdun du bsgrub bya gnyis pa gsal bar bya ba kho na'o //

T02D1920:202b-20: stobs ldan khros pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1920:202b-21: bsgoms nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1920:202b-23: bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon las sprul ba'i tshogs
T02D1920:202b-24: bsgrub bya gnyis ka'i phyogs su dpung byed par bsam
T02D1920:202b-25: par bya'o // yang snying ga'i sa bon las rlung
T02D1920:202b-26: lta bu'i 'od zer rab tu 'khrugs pa 'byung ste
T02D1920:202b-27: par bya'o // / bskul bas gnyis ka 'thab mo mang po byed par bsam mo //
T02D1920:202b-28: bdag nyid kyang khros shing gdug pa'i sems dang ldan
T02D1920:202b-29: pas phan tshun yang stobs dang ldan pas rab tu
T02D1920:202b-31: bsgom byed dag dang mi 'bral ba'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1920:202b-32: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um
T02D1920:202b-33: phat phat de ba datta / ksha dza datte de
T02D1920:202b-34: bi de sha ye h'um phat /
T02D1920:202b-35: ces bya ba stong bzlas pas phan tshun dgrar 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:202b-36: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa'o //
T02D1920:202b-37: da ni bskrad pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D1920:202b-38: cho ga dag ni snga ma bzhin //
T02D1920:202b-39: 'khor lo gnyis ni bris byas la//
T02D1920:202b-40: thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug / skud pa nag pos bcing byas la //
T02D1920:202b-41: sha za'i tshul du sba bar bya'o //
T02D1920:202b-43: cho ga ni dbye ba dag dang phal cher mthun pas na snga ma bzhin zhes bya'o //
T02D1920:202b-44: 'khor lo gnyis ni ae ra nda'i mar me'i dud pa dang /
T02D1920:203a-0: ltogs pa dang mig ser dag gi khrag dang sbyar te @203a * //
T02D1920:203a-2: yi ge h'um phat gnyis kyi bar du ming bla
T02D1920:203a-3: dags dang bcas pa gzhug pa ni rten zhes bya'o
T02D1920:203a-4: // thod pa ni slong mo ba'i ste dkar nag
T02D1920:203a-5: tu byugs la kha sbyar ba'i nang du bya rog
T02D1920:203a-6: dang mig ser gyi rtug bas bkang la bris ba
T02D1920:203a-8: g-yung mo'i sgra'i skud pa nag pos dum bu dum

T02D1920:203a-12: gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas //
T02D1920:203a-13: mdun du bsgrub bya bsgom par bya //
T02D1920:203a-14: yam byung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba'i ;
T02D1920:203a-15: / rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la //
T02D1920:203a-16: de steng mdog sngon rnga mo bsgom //
T02D1920:203a-17: de la gdug pa can bskyon la //
T02D1920:203a-18: lho yi phyogs su kha bstan te //
T02D1920:203a-19: khro bo'i tshogs kyis de brdeg pas //
T02D1920:203a-20: sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog par dka' //
T02D1920:203a-22: ched du lhag par brjod pa ni med do //
T02D1920:203a-23: de yang dus chen po bcu gnyis la bdag nyid
T02D1920:203a-24: gshin rje mthar byed pa'i sbyor ba la gnas nas
T02D1920:203a-25: mdun du bsgrub par bya ba'i sngags kyis rmongs pa
T02D1920:203a-26: lta bu dang yan lag thams cad bra shing gi
T02D1920:203a-27: rtsa ba dang 'dra bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1920:203a-28: de nas mdun du ae nag po chos kyi 'byung
T02D1920:203a-29: gnas mun pa lta bu'i nang du yam las byung
T02D1920:203a-30: ba'i gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag
T02D1920:203a-31: po la / rlung lha sha ba la zhon pa
T02D1920:203a-32: mdog dud kha bdun gyis bskor ba'i dbus su yi
T02D1920:203a-33: ge sham las byung ba'i rnga mo la 'dug ba'i
T02D1920:203a-34: 'od zer chen po 'phros pa'i steng du gdug pa
T02D1920:203a-35: can bskyon la lho'i phyogs su kha bltas te phyi
T02D1920:203a-36: nas phar khro bo mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs bas
T02D1920:203a-37: rdeg cing ded par bsam mo //
T02D1920:203a-38: dper na sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog par dka' ste nges par bskrad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1920:203a-39: de nas rdo rje dril bu la sngags 'di brgya
T02D1920:203a-40: rtsa brgya da du bzlas te 'khor lo la byugs
T02D1920:203a-42: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1920:203a-43: h'um phat de ba datta au tsa ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1920:203a-44: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga'i dam tshig gsungs pa'o //

T02D1920:203a-46: khros bas rnal 'byor lhor bltas la //

T02D1920:203b-0: dug dang tshva @203b dang ske tshe dang //
T02D1920:203b-1: mar khu smyon pa'i khu ba yis //
T02D1920:203b-4: rnal 'byor ni de'i nga rgyal lo //

T02D1920:203b-6: rang khrag ni khro mdzub kyi'o //
T02D1920:203b-7: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba ni rus pa nag po'o //
T02D1920:203b-8: mar khu ni mi'i tshil lo //
T02D1920:203b-9: smyon ba ni smyo byed kyi lo ma'o ;
T02D1920:203b-10: / khu ba ni du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba'o //
T02D1920:203b-12: dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis //
T02D1920:203b-13: rim pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya //
T02D1920:203b-14: zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi ras ni ro ras so //
T02D1920:203b-15: drag po ni de kho na'o //
T02D1920:203b-16: 'khor lo gnyis ni thams cad la'o //
T02D1920:203b-17: rim pa 'di bzhin ni bzhi dang 'khor lo de gsungs pa ;
T02D1920:203b-18: bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas //
T02D1920:203b-19: dbye ba rta dang ma he yis //

T02D1920:203b-21: zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D1920:203b-22: rgyas pa zla ba ser po la //
T02D1920:203b-23: btsun mo'i snying gar dbang du bya //
T02D1920:203b-24: rang la bskyon na 'gugs par byed //
T02D1920:203b-25: lkugs pa lug gi khog par gzhug / rengs pa la ni ri bong dbus //
T02D1920:203b-26: dgug pa seng ge shar pa //
T02D1920:203b-28: bsad pa ni gshin rje'i khong par chud par ro //
T02D1920:203b-29: dbye ba ni ma he dang rta'i rgya ba tu chud par ro //
T02D1920:203b-30: bskrad pa ni rnga mo'i rgyab tu chung par ro //
T02D1920:203b-31: zhi ba ni zla pa'i dkyil 'khor la chud pa'o //
T02D1920:203b-32: rgyas ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la chud par ro //
T02D1920:203b-33: dbang gi ni bud med kyi snying ga ste padma'i gnas su chung par ro //
T02D1920:203b-34: 'gugs bar skyes kyi snying gar chud par ro //
T02D1920:203b-35: lkugs pa lug gi lto bar chud par bya'o //
T02D1920:203b-36: rengs pa ni ri bong gi dbus su chud par bya'o //

T02D1920:203b-39: 'di ltar smyo ba dang nad kyis smyo bar bya

T02D1920:203b-41: bar ro // khyad par gyi rgyu gsungs pa ni /
T02D1920:203b-42: ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang //
T02D1920:203b-43: kha cher skyes pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02D1920:203b-44: dbang du bya ba gro gar bri //
T02D1920:203b-45: zhes pa ni ro tsa na ni glang pa'o //
T02D1920:203b-46: rgya skyegs ni sar pa'i khu ba'o //
T02D1920:203b-47: kha cher skyes pa ni gur gum mo //
T02D1920:203b-48: gro ba ni dmar por ro //
T02D1920:203b-50: dge ba'i sems kyis gzung byas na //
T02D1920:203b-53: dge ba'i sems kyis ni las tha dad pa'i bsam pa'o //
T02D1920:203b-54: gzung ba ni mi bral ba'o //
T02D1920:204a-1: gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir mi slu ba'i don gyis
T02D1920:204a-2: na 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med ces bya'o
T02D1920:204a-3: // mngon spyod kyi lhag ma gsungs pa /
T02D1920:204a-4: kham phor la sogs pa smos te gong du bshad pa kho nar zad do //
T02D1920:204a-5: sngon du bsnyen pa gsungs pa /
T02D1920:204a-6: mtha' yi ya bor zhi ba la //
T02D1920:204a-7: yi ge ni de gnyis ka dang //
T02D1920:204a-8: phyi nas dkyil 'khor ya spangs te //
T02D1920:204a-9: yi ge lhag ma ci bde bar //
T02D1920:204a-10: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho tsam //
T02D1920:204a-12: mtha'i ya ni sngon gyi yi ge ya'o //
T02D1920:204a-13: ni ni nub byang gi yi ge gnyis so //
T02D1920:204a-14: phyi nas dkyil 'khor du yi ge ya spangs pa'i yi ge lhag ma ci bder gzhag go //
T02D1920:204a-15: bsnyen pa ni khri ste tsam lhag mi dgos pa'o //
T02D1920:204a-16: 'di ni las rnams rab bsgrub pa //

T02D1920:204a-18: rdo rje ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pas mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1920:204a-19: bris pa'i skyon gsungs pa ni 'thab mo 'byung ba ste /

T02D1920:204a-22: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las zhes bya ba
T02D1920:204a-24: sngags 'khrul zhing 'khor ba'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1920:204a-25: go rims bris pa 'khor lo ste rim par phye
T02D1920:204a-27: nag po zhabs kyis bshad pa le'u lnga pa rgya cher gsal bar byas pa'o /
T02D1920:204a-30: // / da ni sngon du gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang gtor ma 'khor lo dmigs pa'i le'u gsungs pa ni /
T02D1920:204a-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1920:204a-32: cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
T02D1920:204a-33: po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'char chen po la
T02D1920:204a-34: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'jigs gsol ba btab pa /

T02D1920:204a-36: zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1920:204a-37: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa //
T02D1920:204a-38: dngos grub rgya chen ji ltar thob //
T02D1920:204a-40: gang gis ni rgyu'i rgyud do //
T02D1920:204a-41: rdo rje can ni 'bras bu'i rgyud de /
T02D1920:204a-42: mnyes pa ni tshogs rdzogs par gyur pa'i thabs kyi rgyud de /
T02D1920:204a-43: de dag las gzhan yang zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1920:204a-44: rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa ste de'i phyag
T02D1920:204a-45: rgyas rang rgyud dang gzhan rgyud la ji ltar gdab
T02D1920:204a-46: snyam pa dang mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub
T02D1920:204a-47: rgya chen po ji ltar 'thob par byed pa lags
T02D1920:204a-48: zhes zhus so // de nas rtog pa gsum pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1920:204b-0: @204b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos tshig 'di gsungs so //
T02D1920:204b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi //
T02D1920:204b-2: dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom //
T02D1920:204b-3: rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1920:204b-4: rtag tu sbyin sreg gis kyang dgang //
T02D1920:204b-5: rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang bsgrub //
T02D1920:204b-6: sdom pa dag kyang yang dag gzung//
T02D1920:204b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi lha ni bcu gnyis so //

T02D1920:204b-10: de thams cad kyi dbu la rgyas btab pas gshin rje gshed po bsgom zhes bya'o //
T02D1920:204b-11: mnyes par bya ba'i thabs ni bsnyen sgrub yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba dang /
T02D1920:204b-12: byin gyis brlabs pa'i zhing la yid kyis bri ba dang yang phyi ma ni rtag tu'o //
T02D1920:204b-13: sbyin sreg ni nang gi bdag nyid can te kha
T02D1920:204b-14: zas sbyang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pas ni

T02D1920:204b-17: shes par bya ba ni rtsa ba lnga'i bye brag mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D1920:204b-18: spyad pa ni go ku da ha na la sogs pa'o //
T02D1920:204b-19: rgyun du bsten pa'i phyir rtag tu bsgrub ces bya'o //

T02D1920:204b-26: gnyis pa ral gri sbyin pa ste //

T02D1920:204b-28: bzhi pa zla ba bza' ba yin //
T02D1920:204b-29: bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po //

T02D1920:204b-32: bum pa ni chu 'dzin pa'i bya ba byed pa yin la /

T02D1920:204b-35: dang bcas pa'i bum pa lnga gtso bor gyur pa
T02D1920:204b-36: ste re re zhing bcom ldan 'das nyid du gyur
T02D1920:204b-37: pas na cod pan gyi dbang ngo //
T02D1920:204b-38: de ltar slob ma'i dbang spon du song ba'i slob
T02D1920:204b-39: dpon gyi dbang ni gzhan gyi don khyad par du
T02D1920:204b-40: spyod cing log par rtogs pa'i rnam grangs du ma
T02D1920:204b-42: gnyis pa ral gri sbyin par bya //
T02D1920:205a-0: gsang ba'i dbang ni gnyis su med pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems @205a * //
T02D1920:205a-1: kyi khu ba dag slob mas yongs su spyod pa ste /
T02D1920:205a-2: bo la dang ka kko la'i sgra'i bdag gi rtags
T02D1920:205a-3: su rdo rje dang dril bu ste de las byung
T02D1920:205a-4: ba zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1920:205a-7: bza' ba ni yid kyis sems nyams su myong bar bya'o //
